name: The Chicken, the Ghost and the Mountain
name_original: The Chicken, the Ghost and the Mountain
description:
Help the two chickens in their revenge quest against an evil farmer!

Click and drag the ghost to kick the chicken up the mountain!

Don't forget to kick the farmer's house down the mountain when you get to the top!

Made with Godot by JVdev, LgL and Morel for the Weekly Game Jam 146.

Background by vnitti

Tileset by aamatniekss

Font and sound effect
